title: "Forest Falls Wallpaper"
content:
ðŸŒ³ðŸŒŠ Welcome to our website featuring the serene beauty of a waterfall in the forest. Our collection of wallpapers will transport you to a peaceful oasis surrounded by lush greenery and the soothing sound of cascading water.

Our carefully curated selection of high-quality images showcases the natural wonder of these breathtaking landscapes. Whether you're looking to enhance your desktop background or create a calming atmosphere in your home, our collection has something for everyone.

Experience the tranquility of nature with our Forest Falls Wallpaper collection.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A waterfall in the forest"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
